mainText:
Promo: Bank of Entitlement - Where Your Demands Are Our Commands!

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So, get this-I sauntered into Bank of Entitlement, expecting the red carpet treatment as always. My cappuccino hadn't even hit the perfect frothiness when a teller had the audacity to ask me to fill out a deposit slip. Can you believe the nerve?! I flung my designer sunglasses off dramatically, exclaiming, "Do you know who I am? I am Hot Josh, the CEO of this fine establishment! I don't do paperwork, darling. My money floats in on clouds of entitlement!" The teller, clearly flustered by my presence, quickly ushered me to a VIP lounge where I enjoyed massages and champagne while my banking needs were met promptly. Ah, the perks of being me!
